2.action:
Add the following lines in conf/local.conf  

INHERIT += "extrausers"  

EXTRA_USERS_PARAMS = "\ 
useradd -s /bin/sh -P 'tester3' tester3;\ 
"  

The above settings do the following things: 
a. Add a user tester3 with cleartext password 'tester3'

3.expected_results: Login with user name "tester3" and password "tester3"
